transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hanji
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji. Sir Amit Shukla baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Hanji boliye.
Executive: Sir inquiry likhne ke liye aap call kiye receive kiye kaye ke liye call kiye.
Customer: Hanji.
Customer: Mai mai Himanshu bol raha hu sir.
Executive: Are Himanshu bol raha hai ya jo bhi bol raha hai maine maine IndiaMART ke is number par call back kiya hai to maine kuch complaint karne ke liye call kiya hai sahab to aap ha boliye boliye aisa kyu puch rahe hai ki kyu call kiya hai.
Customer: Nahi maine aapse kab bola ki aap call kiya. Sir mai mai samajh nahi paya isliye mai aapko puch raha tha. Na hello na suniye to bhai sahab pehle meri baat suniye. Na hello na hi na naam na puchna na namaskar na hua na salam. Kaha pe kaam kar rahe ho bhaiya.
Executive: Accha bataiye bataiye sir good morning. Company me kaam kar rahe hai na bhaiya.
Customer: Ha bataiye bataiye sir good afternoon bataiye. Ye aisa nahi kar rahe aap log hamara phone receive karke.
Executive: Are nahi sir mai puch to raha hu aapse bataiye kya hua boliye. Are kya puchna hai bhai sahab aap kya puch rahe hai aap hum aapko call back kar rahe hai ye IndiaMART ko bilkul barbad karke rakh rahe hai bhai sahab aap log.
Customer: Kya hua bataiye to sahi kya complaint hai mujhe bataiye. IndiaMART ki credit valuation khatam ho jayegi.
Executive: Accha bataiye sir kya hua bataiye to sahi.
Customer: Are bhaiya kya hua aap aisi baat kar rahe hai aap log ki directly phone kyu receive karte hai bhai.
Executive: Sir aapne call kiya tha na customer care pe call kiya hoga na aapne.
Customer: Ha customer care pe kiya hua mujhe complaint karani hai.
Executive: Ha boliye boliye kya baat hai bataiye sir.
Customer: Bhai sahab maine aaj ek saal complete ho gaya hoga mai IndiaMART ke kitne logo se call karu sir kinse kinse baat karu mai.
Executive: Sir maine to aapko
Customer: Mujhe pehle meri baat suniye pehle meri baat suniye abhi tak ye confirm nahi hai ki mera IndiaMART ka kaun wo chala raha hai. Mera accountant kaun hai ye jankari nahi hai mujhe.
Executive: Nahi sir mai hi aapka account manager hu maine aapse pehle bhi connect kiya hua hai aur hum logo ne baat bhi ki hai aapko yaad hoga.
Customer: Mera account kaun hai ye jankari nahi hai mujhe. Abhi ek din connect karne se nahi hota na bhaiya.
Executive: Accha to bataiye ki aap mujhe bataiye kya samasya aayi hai ek baar bataiye to sahi sir. Aap dekhiye mere IndiaMART ko khol ke check kariye kya samasya aa rahi hai aap bataiye mujhe. Dekhiye aap.
Executive: Sir abhi to dekho aaj hamara off hai. Thik hai sir mai to aaj hu bhi nahi duty pe. To aap mujhe bataiye agar koi aap kaho to mai aapko kal connect kar leta hu.
Customer: To Himanshu ji kal Himanshu ji kal kitne baje call karenge aap.
Executive: Aap mujhe bataiye aap kab tak aapka free rahenge to mai aapko usi time pe connect kar lunga sir.
Customer: Aap 10 ke baad kal mujhe call kar lijiye.
Executive: Thik hai mai aapko kal connect karta hu sir positive connect karta hu. Hai na.
Customer: Kitne baje tak call karenge ji mujhe. Kitne baje tak karna hai aapko kal.
Executive: Mai aapko kar leta hu kal 11 baje kareeb connect kar lunga sir.
Customer: Thik hai mai 11 baje wait karta hu aapka. Ha mai
Customer: Nahi ho to Himanshu bhaiya Himanshu ji agar nahi ho to please meri ek ticket khulwa dijiye bas ho gayi baat khatam mujhe mat kuch karo ye. Sir sir ticket open ho hi gayi hai kyuki aapne customer care pe call kiya hai. To ye automatically usi pe hua hai. To agar aap waise mujhe thoda sa ye to bataiye ki problem kahan face kar rahe hai IndiaMART ke kis kis kis cheez me problem aa rahi hai mujhe thoda brief me bataiye aisi baat nahi hai.
Customer: Koi bhi inquiry nahi aa rahi bhai sahab koi bhi inquiry nahi aa rahi hai aur koi bhi guideline karne ke liye koi bhi banda nahi hai mujhe ye nahi pata aap bata rahe hai ki aap mere mera account aap manage kar rahe hai mujhe jankari abhi ho rahi hai.
Executive: Sir maine aapko connect kiya tha aapse
Customer: Connect kiya bhaiya abhi tak mere paas number tak save nahi hai aapka.
Executive: Sir maine to aapse baat bhi ki hui hai maine to aapse us time pe bhi kaha tha ki sir mai aapka account manager hu. Himanshu ji mai mai fir keh raha hu ki agar IndiaMART ka toll free number ye hai to IndiaMART ko halaki mai mail kar raha hu abhi mai mail bana raha hu mai ye keh raha hu ki mujhe chod dijiye mera paise ki koi value nahi hai bhaiya paisa koi dikkat nahi hai lekin aur bhi jo kyuki mujhe taklif ye hai kyuki IndiaMART mera parivar hai. Hai na itna bada mukam khada kiya itna bada platform tayar kiya hai to unko barbad na best na kare hum aapko nahi keh rahe hai jo bhi log karya kar rahe hai ye karyo ko accha nahi kar rahe hai.
Executive: Accha nahi wo thik hai sir mai samajh gaya aapka jo concern hai ek baar mai kal aapko connect karta hu hai na baith ke isko discuss karte hai jo bhi aapki samasya hai usko solve kiya jayega aisi koi baat nahi sir. Hai na.
Executive: Mai aapko kal
Customer: Thik hai Himanshu ji kal kabhi agar lagega to aap kariyega baki aap meri ek ticket khol dijiye bas.
Executive: Sir ticket open ho gayi hai automatic ho jati hai agar aap customer care pe call karoge na to wo automatic open ho jati hai aisa kuch nahi hai aur jab tak aap se aap jab tak aap satisfy nahi hoge na tab tak usko close bhi nahi kiya jayega thik hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai bhaiya. Thik hai sir thik hai thank you. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know who is handling IndiaMART account.

- No inquiries are being received.

- No one is available for guidance.

- Wants a ticket to be opened.



Resolution:

- Executive informed that he is the account manager.

- Assured to connect the next day to discuss issues.

- Informed ticket is automatically created on customer care call.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect the next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account management, inquiries, ticket, customer care
